author: Dan De Luce, Ken Dilanian, Carol E. Lee, Courtney Kube
title: As U.S. struggles to stem coronavirus, China asserts itself as global leader
description: China is moving quickly to portray itself as an international leader fighting COVID-19, providing medical equipment to other countries and ramping up its propaganda war with Washington.
content:
With Italy in dire need of medical equipment, an economic superpower stepped in to help.
No, not the United States.
It was China.
Beijing last week promised Rome a thousand ventilators and 2 million masks, part of a global outreach effort that includes mas… [+11785 chars]
